title: JLR steps up its 5-year investment plan by £3 billion
description: Tata Motors has increased its five-year investment in Jaguar Land Rover to £18 billion for FY24-FY28, up from £15 billion, focusing on developing electric vehicles and hybrid models. This aligns with JLR's "Reimagine" strategy. Additionally, JLR will partner with China's Chery to produce electric vehicles under the Freelander brand in China.
